metadata.name: One
metadata.description:
Choppers became a popular kind of motorcycle in California during the 1950â€™s. They were based on the drag-racing motorcycles of the time.

In the world of motorcycles, Choppers symbolize beauty and freedom, but it's their history that makes them so cool.

Choppers are a blessing for everyone who loves motorcycles. They are not only stylish motorcycles but also precious artwork. 

OTA
